title: New: Noble Oak – We Decide
body:
Now without wanting to blow my own trumpet, witnessing the rise and rise of Vancouver dreampop artist Noble Oak has been all the more pleasing given that I was one of the first to pick up on the immeasurable talent of Patrick.

My selfish pride aside, new track We Decide is destined to open his music up to even more ears, with it’s beautifully tender vocals and fully immersing simmering atmosphere. _‘this is not what i planned out in my head things are not the same as what you said’_
